Replace.Text: "There is, one knows not what sweet mystery about this sea, whose gently awful stirrings seem to speak of some hidden soul beneath … for here, millions of mixed shades and shadows, drowned dreams, somnambulisms, reveries; all that we call lives and souls, lie dreaming, dreaming, still."[NEWLINE]– Herman Melville

"Chyavana, desirous of obtaining beauty, quickly entered into the water. The twin Aswins also, O King, sank into the sheet of water. And the next moment, they all came out … in surpassingly beautiful forms, and young."[NEWLINE]- Anonymous
"Hidden in the glorious wildness like unmined gold."[NEWLINE]- John Muir
+{1_num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture from the adjacent natural wonder Païtiti.
+{1_num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold from the adjacent natural wonder Païtiti.
A rainforest regrowing after a fire.
A comet crushed whatever was previously here.
